title: Video Editing Intern
description: Edit short-form content for YouTube, Instagram Reels, and client ads. Work closely with directors to create engaging cuts, add sound design, and deliver final exports in multiple formats. You will handle raw footage management, create motion graphics, and learn advanced post-production workflows used in commercial projects.
candidate_expectations: We seek creative, deadline-driven individuals with a strong aesthetic sense and passion for storytelling through video. You should be comfortable receiving feedback and iterating quickly. Good communication and ability to work in a fast-paced studio environment are essential.

title: Graphic Design Intern
description: Design social media creatives, branding collateral, website banners, and marketing materials for startups and enterprises. Collaborate with the creative team on client pitches and revisions while maintaining brand guidelines and delivering pixel-perfect assets.
candidate_expectations: We want a visually curious designer who stays updated with trends and loves experimenting, and takes ownership of projects. Strong time management, openness to critique, and excellent file organization skills are must-haves.

title: Full Stack Development Intern
description: Build and maintain features for web applications, write clean code, participate in code reviews, and deploy updates to production. You will work on both frontend and backend tasks, integrate APIs, and solve real-time user issues in an agile environment.
candidate_expectations: We look for problem-solvers who love coding, ask questions, and are not afraid of debugging. Good logical thinking, teamwork, and eagerness to learn new technologies are highly valued.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Plan and execute campaigns on Meta, Google, and LinkedIn, analyze performance metrics, create ad copies, and optimize for better ROI. You will also assist in content calendar planning and competitor analysis.
candidate_expectations: We need energetic, data-driven individuals who are comfortable with numbers and creative copywriting. Proactiveness, attention to detail, and ability to handle multiple campaigns simultaneously are crucial.

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Clean and analyze large datasets, build interactive dashboards, and provide actionable business insights. You will work with sales, marketing, and product teams to answer key questions using data visualization and statistical methods.
candidate_expectations: We seek analytical minds with intellectual curiosity and storytelling ability through data. Strong communication to explain technical findings to non-technical stakeholders is essential, along with a structured approach to problem-solving.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Develop and train models for computer vision and NLP projects, perform data preprocessing, experiment tracking, and model deployment using Flask/FastAPI. You will collaborate with senior ML engineers on production-grade systems.
candidate_expectations: We are looking for passionate learners with solid foundations in mathematics and programming. Ability to read research papers, experiment rigorously, and document findings clearly is highly appreciated.

title: Finance Intern

candidate_expectations: We need meticulous, ethical individuals with high integrity and numerical accuracy. Proactive attitude, confidentiality, and willingness to learn accounting standards are required.

title: Human Resources Intern

candidate_expectations: We seek number-loving students with genuine interest in markets. Discipline to read annual reports, unbiased thinking, and clear writing are must-haves.

title: Fashion Styling Intern
description: Style e-commerce shoots, celebrity photoshoots, and magazine editorials. Pull clothes, create looks, and assist on set.
candidate_expectations: We need trend-obsessed individuals with strong visual sense. Confidence with high-value garments, organization, and networking skills are essential.

title: NLP Engineer Intern
description: Fine-tune multilingual models, build chatbots in Hindi/Tamil, create datasets, and deploy on cloud for customer support automation.
candidate_expectations: We seek language + code lovers passionate about Indian languages. Research mindset, experimentation rigor, and collaboration are highly valued.

title: Coffee Roasting Intern
description: Roast specialty Arabica beans, conduct cupping sessions, develop new blends, and learn farm-to-cup supply chain.
candidate_expectations: We need coffee fanatics with sensitive palates. Willingness to work on plantations, attention to roast consistency, and customer education skills are essential.

title: Political Campaign Intern
description: Run booth-level campaigns, manage WhatsApp groups, create posters, and collect voter feedback during election season.
candidate_expectations: We seek high-energy individuals comfortable in grassroots politics. Resilience, local network, and non-partisan execution ability are required.

title: Aviation Operations Intern
description: Assist in ground handling, passenger services, ramp coordination, and safety audits at regional airports.
candidate_expectations: We need alert, responsible individuals who thrive in time-critical environments. English + regional language fluency and grooming standards are mandatory.

title: Handicraft Design Intern
description: Design new home decor and apparel lines using traditional Rajasthani crafts. Work directly with artisans and launch on e-commerce.
candidate_expectations: We seek designers who respect traditional techniques while adding modern appeal. Cultural sensitivity, patience with artisans, and business sense are essential.

title: Clinical Psychology Intern
description: Assist therapists in sessions, administer psychological tests, maintain case files, and conduct group therapy under supervision.
candidate_expectations: We look for empathetic, non-judgmental psychology students. Strict confidentiality, emotional stability, and genuine desire to help are non-negotiable.

title: Tea Tasting Intern
description: Taste and grade CTC and orthodox teas, create new blends, visit gardens, and learn auction processes.
candidate_expectations: We need individuals with refined palate and passion for tea. Willingness to live on estates and scientific approach to tasting are required.

title: Museum Curation Intern
description: Curate temporary exhibitions, write labels, digitize artifacts, and conduct guided tours on Indian history and culture.
candidate_expectations: We seek history buffs with storytelling ability. Research depth, public speaking, and respect for artifacts are essential.

title: Solar Sales Intern
description: Generate leads for rooftop solar, conduct energy audits, prepare quotations, and close deals with homeowners and factories.
candidate_expectations: We need confident communicators who can explain technical + financial benefits. Hustle, local travel willingness, and closing skills are key.

title: Script Writing Intern
description: Write short-form web series episodes, daily soaps, and reels for OTT platforms. Participate in writers’ room and pitching.
candidate_expectations: We seek storytellers with strong Hindi dialogue and emotional understanding of Indian audiences. Speed, collaboration, and thick skin for notes are essential.

title: Gemology Intern
description: Grade diamonds and colored stones, issue certificates, learn spectroscopy, and handle client verifications.
candidate_expectations: We need detail-obsessed individuals with steady hands and color perception. Integrity and passion for gems are non-negotiable.

title: Adventure Tourism Intern
description: Lead trekking and paragliding groups, ensure safety, manage logistics, and create content for social media.
candidate_expectations: We seek fit, outdoorsy individuals certified in basic mountaineering. Leadership in emergencies, cheerfulness, and guest safety focus are mandatory.

title: Pharmacy Operations Intern
description: Manage stock, dispense medicines, counsel patients, handle insurance claims, and ensure regulatory compliance.
candidate_expectations: We need responsible B.Pharm students with accuracy in dispensing. Ethical selling, empathy, and knowledge of generics are required.

title: Ceramic Design Intern
description: Design tableware and decor items, experiment with clays and glazes, assist production, and develop new collections.
candidate_expectations: We seek hands-on artists who love getting dirty with clay. Patience with firing failures, creativity, and understanding of Indian aesthetics are essential.

title: Radio Programming Intern
description: Plan and execute radio segments, go live on air, edit jingles, and manage listener contests.
candidate_expectations: We need energetic voices with perfect Hindi/English diction. Spontaneity, humor, and ability to connect with masses are crucial.

title: Textile Design Intern
description: Create new Tussar silk designs, work with weavers, experiment with natural dyes, and develop sustainable collections.
candidate_expectations: We seek designers passionate about Indian textiles and artisan empowerment. Respect for slow craft and innovation balance are essential.

title: Cricket Analytics Intern
description: Code ball-by-ball data, build player performance models, create match-up insights, and support IPL franchises.
candidate_expectations: We need cricket statisticians who breathe the game. Deep tactical understanding, coding skills, and storytelling with numbers are required.

title: Spice Export Intern
description: Test cardamom and pepper quality, prepare export documents, coordinate shipments, and learn global standards.
candidate_expectations: We seek detail-oriented individuals with interest in agri-exports. Sensory skills for spices and documentation accuracy are essential.

title: Stand-up Comedy Intern
description: Write jokes, perform open mics, host shows, and manage social media for the comedy scene.
candidate_expectations: We need fearless, quick-witted individuals who can handle bombing nights. Original material, timing, and audience reading are crucial.

title: Maritime Operations Intern
description: Track container movements, coordinate with shipping lines, prepare bills of lading, and learn port operations.
candidate_expectations: We seek organized individuals comfortable with 24/7 operations. Quick math, pressure handling, and maritime interest are essential.

title: Calligraphy & Typography Intern
description: Create custom wedding invites, brand lettering, packaging typography, and teach workshops.
candidate_expectations: We need patient artists with steady hands and love for letters. Versatility across scripts and client communication are key.

title: Dairy Technology Intern
description: Assist in milk processing, develop new cheese and yogurt variants, conduct lab tests, and learn cold chain.
candidate_expectations: We seek food tech students passionate about dairy. Hygiene consciousness, sensory skills, and scientific approach are essential.

title: Puppetry Arts Intern
description: Craft traditional shadow and string puppets, learn manipulation techniques, and perform shows for schools and tourists.
candidate_expectations: We seek creative individuals interested in preserving folk arts. Dexterity, voice modulation, and dedication to craft are required.

title: Bamboo Craft Intern
description: Design modern bamboo furniture and lifestyle products, train artisans, and launch collections online.
candidate_expectations: We need eco-conscious designers who value rural craftsmanship. Patience with artisans and sustainable thinking are essential.

title: Astrophysics Research Intern
description: Operate high-altitude telescopes, reduce astronomical data, assist public stargazing, and contribute to research papers.
candidate_expectations: We seek space lovers ready for cold nights and high altitude. Coding skills, patience, and wonder for the universe are required.

title: Leather Craft Intern
description: Design and craft premium leather bags and accessories using ethical tanning methods.
candidate_expectations: We need meticulous crafters with love for natural materials. Precision stitching and premium quality obsession are essential.

title: Folk Music Research Intern
description: Travel to villages to record folk musicians, transcribe songs, digitize archives, and create educational content.
candidate_expectations: We seek musicologists passionate about preserving Bengal’s folk heritage. Humility with rural artists and research rigor are mandatory.

title: Terracotta Design Intern
description: Revive traditional Bankura horse and temple motifs in contemporary products while training local potters.
candidate_expectations: We need artists who respect centuries-old techniques. Physical stamina for kiln work and cultural sensitivity are essential.

title: Railway Operations Intern
description: Assist in parcel and freight train operations, track rakes, coordinate loading/unloading, and learn railway systems.
candidate_expectations: We seek disciplined individuals fascinated by railways. Attention to timetables, safety consciousness, and coordination skills are required.

title: Silk Saree Design Intern
description: Design new Kanchipuram silk saree patterns, work with master weavers, and document the weaving process.
candidate_expectations: We need designers who understand the sanctity of handloom sarees. Respect for tradition while innovating is key.

title: Tribal Jewelry Intern
description: Learn lost-wax Dhokra technique, design tribal jewelry with Gond and Maria artisans, and market GI-tagged products.
candidate_expectations: We seek designers passionate about tribal art preservation. Living in remote areas and cultural immersion are required.

title: Classical Dance Intern
description: Assist in Bharatanatyam arangetram preparations, teach junior students, and perform in temple festivals.
candidate_expectations: We need dedicated dancers with strong abhinaya and discipline. Devotion to the art form and guru-shishya tradition are essential.

title: Coir Product Design Intern
description: Design modern coir mats, bags, and decor items using traditional Kerala techniques and sustainable materials.
candidate_expectations: We seek eco-designers who value women coir workers. Innovation with natural fibers and rural immersion are required.

title: Railway Operations Intern
description: Assist in parcel and freight train operations, track rakes, coordinate loading/unloading, and learn railway systems.
candidate_expectations: We seek disciplined individuals fascinated by railways. Attention to timetables, safety consciousness, and coordination skills are required.
